translation.it: Dorothea Puente era amata dalla sua comunità e dai politici locali,

translation.it: Alcuni ospiti erano alcolisti. Altri avevano disabilità mentali.

translation.it: In alcuni casi,

translation.it: le veniva conferita l'autorità di firmare quegli assegni

translation.it: e depositarli in banca, cosa che faceva.

translation.it: Andammo a casa di Dorothea Puente per capire se fosse adatta a Bert.

translation.it: Dava loro da mangiare con dei piccoli biberon.

translation.it: Ci diceva: "Scusate, ho qui dei gattini".

translation.en: We're really impressed with that.
translation.it: Rimanemmo davvero colpiti.

translation.it: Quando scendemmo a vedere la stanza,

translation.it: Sarà anche solo una stanza, ma avere un bel posto dove vivere e del buon cibo

translation.it: ma avere un bel posto dove vivere e del buon cibo per noi è davvero positivo".

translation.en: I was impressed.

translation.en: I thought this does sound like a good place,
translation.it: Mi sembrava proprio un bel posto.

translation.it: Lo dissi anche a lei, che mi rispose:

translation.it: "Sa, sono indipendente a livello finanziario.

translation.it: Bert avrebbe usato gli assegni della previdenza sociale

translation.it: "Non è proprio da Bert".

translation.it: Mi disse: "Forse sarà di ritorno venerdì".

translation.en: When I called, "No, he isn't here. He'll be back next week."
translation.it: Richiamai: "Non c'è, torna la settimana prossima.

translation.it: Non si preoccupi".

translation.it: Io risposi: "No, lunedì chiamerò la polizia

translation.it: Risposi.

translation.en: [William P. Wood] Dorothea Puente was born Dorothea Grey in Redlands, California, in 1929.
translation.it: Dorothea Puente, da nubile Grey, nacque a Redlands, California, nel 1929.

translation.en: She had a hardscrabble upbringing,
translation.it: Ebbe un'infanzia difficile.

translation.en: and both of her parents died relatively early when she was young.
translation.it: Entrambi i genitori morirono presto, quando lei era piccola.

translation.en: Her first crimes are committed down in southern California.
translation.it: Commise i primi crimini nel sud della California.

translation.en: As I remember, the first recorded time when she hits the system is in 1948.
translation.it: Se ricordo bene, la prima volta che finì in carcere fu nel 1948.

translation.en: She was convicted of felony forgery of writing a fictitious check.
translation.it: Venne condannata per la falsificazione di un assegno.

translation.en: In the 1950s, Dorothea worked as a prostitute in Sacramento.
translation.it: Negli anni '50, Dorothea lavorò come prostituta a Sacramento.

translation.en: And then, after a period of years, she became a madam.
translation.it: Dopo qualche anno, divenne una maitresse.

translation.en: She was arrested and prosecuted for being both a prostitute and a madam
translation.it: Fu arrestata e processata come prostituta e tenutaria di un bordello

translation.en: and sent to jail for a short period of time.
translation.it: e andò in prigione per un breve periodo.

translation.en: [Wood] In 1982, I was in the Sacramento District Attorney's office
translation.it: Nel 1982, lavoravo alla procura di Sacramento

translation.en: on a temporary assignment.
translation.it: per un incarico temporaneo.

translation.en: The first time that I became aware of Dorothea Puente
translation.it: La prima volta che sentii il nome di Dorothea Puente

translation.en: was a case involving a gentleman named Malcolm McKenzie.
translation.it: fu per il caso di un certo Malcolm McKenzie.

translation.en: [Wood] Mackenzie was an older man that Puente picked up at a bar.
translation.it: Puente aveva abbordato Mackenzie, più grande di lei, in un bar.

translation.en: They had two drinks together.
translation.it: Avevano bevuto due drink.

translation.en: He then told her that he lived nearby and took her home.
translation.it: Lui abitava nei paraggi e l'aveva portata a casa sua.

translation.en: When they got to his house,
translation.it: Quando erano arrivati da lui,

translation.en: he began to feel very strange, and he lay down.
translation.it: Mackenzie aveva iniziato a sentirsi male.

translation.en: And at that point, he could not move.
translation.it: Non riusciva a muoversi.

translation.en: He said he was absolutely paralyzed,
translation.it: Si sentiva completamente paralizzato,

translation.en: but he was able to see what Puente was doing
translation.it: ma era riuscito a vedere cosa faceva Puente

translation.en: inside of his apartment.
translation.it: nel suo appartamento.

translation.en: He'd been administered some kind of stupefying agent,
translation.it: Gli era stata somministrata una sostanza stupefacente,

translation.en: but he was able to watch her go through his belongings,
translation.it: ma era riuscito a vederla frugare tra i suoi averi

translation.en: take some coins.
translation.it: e rubare delle monete.

translation.en: She had came over to him and actually pulled a ring off his hand
translation.it: Gli aveva persino sfilato l'anello dalla mano,

translation.en: and then left.
translation.it: per poi andarsene.

translation.en: When he reported it to the police,
translation.it: Quando sporse denuncia,

translation.en: several hours later after he had regained his motion,
translation.it: diverse ore dopo essersi ripreso e aver ricominciato a muoversi,

translation.en: Puente was arrested.
translation.it: Puente fu arrestata.

translation.en: During that same period of time,
translation.it: Nello stesso periodo,

translation.en: Dorothea was passing herself off as a medical doctor to various elderly women
translation.it: Dorothea si era spacciata per un medico con donne in età avanzata,

translation.en: and taking advantage of them.
translation.it: per approfittarsi di loro.

translation.en: She would sometimes carry around a medical bag
translation.it: A volte portava con sé una valigetta

translation.en: to make it look as though she was a practitioner of some sort.
translation.it: per sembrare un qualche tipo di dottore,

translation.en: She had a stethoscope in there. She had a blood pressure cuff.
translation.it: con uno stetoscopio e un apparecchio per la pressione.

translation.en: She was not a doctor. She was not a nurse. They were props.
translation.it: Non era un medico o un'infermiera. Era una finta.

translation.en: She was administering some kind of stupefying drug to them
translation.it: Somministrava loro un qualche tipo di stupefacente,

translation.en: because all of the victims reported the same kind of symptoms.
translation.it: perché tutte le vittime avevano gli stessi sintomi.

translation.en: And when they awoke,
translation.it: Quando si risvegliavano,

translation.it: e fu condannata a cinque anni di reclusione.

translation.it: La notizia finì sui media locali. Facevano anche il mio nome.

translation.it: e Dorothea diceva che avrebbe voluto aprire un ristorante,

translation.it: Sostiene che Puente abbia ideato gli omicidi

translation.en: to collect on about $50,000 in assistance checks.
translation.it: per riscuotere assegni per circa 50.000 dollari.

translation.en: Prosecutor John O'Mara used a combination of visual aids
translation.it: Il procuratore O'Mara ha usato un mix di supporti visivi

translation.en: and gruesome home video to make his point.
translation.it: e video raccapriccianti a sostegno della sua tesi.

translation.en: It was a complex case because we didn't have a confession
translation.it: Era un caso complesso perché non c'erano state confessioni

translation.en: or anything that told us that she actually killed them.
translation.it: o altre prove inequivocabili della sua colpevolezza.

translation.en: Her statement would be she admitted to cashing the checks
translation.it: Lei aveva dichiarato di aver incassato gli assegni

translation.en: after they died in their sleep.
translation.it: dopo che erano morti nel sonno.

translation.en: They were sick. She didn't kill them.
translation.it: Erano malati, non li aveva uccisi lei.

translation.en: She buried them. She couldn't call the police authorities.
translation.it: Li aveva seppelliti. Non poteva chiamare la polizia.

translation.en: Why? Because she was on parole.
translation.it: Perché? Perché era in libertà vigilata.

translation.en: That made sense.
translation.it: Aveva senso.

translation.en: We, the jury, in the above-entitled cause, find the defendant, Dorothea Montalvo Puente,
translation.it: La giuria, nel procedimento sopracitato, dichiara Dorothea Montalvo Puente

translation.en: guilty of the crime of murder in the first degree.
translation.it: colpevole di omicidio di primo grado.

translation.en: The defendant is to be imprisoned in the state prison
translation.it: L'imputata sarà incarcerata nella prigione di stato

translation.en: for a term of life without possibility of parole.
translation.it: e sconterà un ergastolo senza possibilità di condizionale.

translation.en: [reporter] A jury has convicted California landlady Dorothea Puente of murder.
translation.it: La giuria ha condannato per omicidio l'affittacamere Puente,

translation.en: She was charged with killing nine people and cashing their Social Security checks.
translation.it: accusata di aver ucciso nove persone per incassarne gli assegni.

translation.en: The jury declared her guilty of three murders and deadlocked on six others.
translation.it: La giuria l'ha condannata per tre omicidi e non si è pronunciata su sei.

translation.en: [Cabrera] There was one juror that maybe believed her story that they died naturally,
translation.it: Forse uno dei giurati aveva creduto alla storia della morte naturale

translation.en: and he decided that he wasn't going to find her guilty
translation.it: e aveva deciso che non l'avrebbe dichiarata colpevole

translation.en: on any more than three murders.
translation.it: per più di tre omicidi.

translation.en: [Wood] He also probably was one of the last people that had fallen
translation.it: Fu uno degli ultimi a cadere vittima

translation.en: for the older, grandmotherly, innocuous, harmless kind of look.
translation.it: del suo aspetto da nonnina innocua e inoffensiva.

translation.en: [Wood] We are standing here at the Sacramento County Courthouse.
translation.it: Siamo al tribunale della contea di Sacramento.

translation.en: Approximately four blocks from here
translation.it: A circa quattro isolati da qui,

translation.en: is where she was burying people in her yard.
translation.it: Dorothea seppelliva le sue vittime in cortile.

translation.en: She was killing people on the main street in the capital of the state of California.
translation.it: Le uccideva sulla strada principale della capitale della California.

translation.en: I don't think any other serial killer has been either that audacious
translation.it: Nessun altro serial killer è mai stato così audace

translation.en: or gotten away with that kind of crime.
translation.it: o l'ha fatta franca così a lungo.

translation.en: In the end, I believe it was about money and power.
translation.it: Alla fine, credo che lo facesse per soldi e potere.

translation.en: If somehow, for some reason, you were receiving a Social Security check,
translation.it: Se ricevi gli assegni della previdenza sociale,

translation.en: it's all right for you to designate me as the payee for that check.
translation.it: puoi designare me come beneficiario.

translation.en: And then, of course, if I could continue to get those checks
translation.it: E quindi, io posso continuare a riceverli dopo averti ucciso.

translation.en: after killing you and no one knew that you were dead,
translation.it: E quindi, io posso continuare a riceverli dopo averti ucciso. E se nessuno sa che sei morto, posso riceverli per sempre.

translation.en: then I just get those checks forever.
translation.it: E se nessuno sa che sei morto, posso riceverli per sempre.

translation.en: I think Dorothea picked out people from the street
translation.it: Credo che Dorothea scegliesse persone senza casa

translation.en: that had no relatives that were there for them.
translation.it: e senza parenti accanto.

translation.en: And so, in this vulnerability, it can be taken advantage of.
translation.it: Così, data la loro vulnerabilità, poteva approfittarsi di loro.

translation.en: [Cabrera] By Dorothea killing these people,
translation.it: Uccidendo quelle persone,

translation.en: she gained $100,000 in total,
translation.it: Dorothea guadagnò un totale di centomila dollari.

translation.en: and she was putting it to use, donating money to the politicians, free food.
translation.it: E lei li sfruttava, effettuando donazioni a politici ed enti di beneficenza.

translation.en: And so she was always looked at as a philanthropist who gave a lot,
translation.it: La ammiravano tutti perché aveva fama di essere una generosa filantropa.

translation.en: and from that, she gained status in the community.
translation.it: E così, divenne popolare nella comunità.

translation.en: That was the power.
translation.it: Quello era potere.

translation.en: She was able to operate with nobody ever questioning her,
translation.it: Le permetteva di agire senza contestazioni.

translation.en: but the clothing that she was giving to charities,
translation.it: Ma i vestiti che donava in beneficenza

translation.en: that was the clothing that was from her victims.
translation.it: erano quelli delle vittime.

translation.en: [Wood] The people Dorothea murdered were Leona Carpenter,
translation.it: Le persone uccise da Dorothea erano: Leona Carpenter,

translation.en: Bert Montoya,
translation.it: Bert Montoya

translation.en: and Ruth Munroe.
translation.it: e Ruth Munroe.

translation.en: They were real people.
translation.it: Erano persone vere.

translation.en: Every single one of them.
translation.it: Ognuna di loro.

translation.en: [sniffles] I'm sorry.
translation.it: Scusate.

translation.en: I didn't think that would happen.
translation.it: Non me lo aspettavo.

translation.en: A Sacramento landlady,
translation.it: Una donna di Sacramento,

translation.en: convicted of killing three of her tenants in the 1980s, has died in prison.
translation.it: condannata per aver ucciso tre inquilini negli anni '80, è morta in carcere.

translation.en: Prosecutors say Dorothea Puente
translation.it: Secondo i procuratori, Puente

translation.en: stole the Social Security checks of her elderly tenants,
translation.it: rubava gli assegni ai suoi anziani inquilini,

translation.en: killed them, and then buried their bodies in her backyard. Puente was 82.
translation.it: li uccideva e seppelliva i corpi nel suo giardino. Puente aveva 82 anni.

translation.en: [Bill] There is no closure to it.
translation.it: Non puoi lasciartelo alle spalle.

translation.en: I mean, you have to move on.
translation.it: Sì, devi andare avanti.

translation.en: You still live,
translation.it: Sei ancora vivo,

translation.en: but when there's no conviction,
translation.it: ma senza una condanna,

translation.en: there is no closure.
translation.it: non puoi superare la cosa.

translation.en: [Cabrera] After I arrested Dorothea in Los Angeles,
translation.it: Dopo aver arrestato Dorothea a Los Angeles,

translation.en: when I picked her up on the tarmac,
translation.it: quando la prelevai in aeroporto,

translation.en: the last thing she said was, "Mr. Cabrera, I'm sorry."
translation.it: le ultime parole che mi disse furono: "Signor Cabrera, mi dispiace".

translation.en: I've always believed that in that small moment
translation.it: Ho sempre creduto che, in quel breve istante,

translation.en: that she was actually sorry for everything,
translation.it: fosse davvero sinceramente dispiaciuta.

translation.en: just in that moment.
translation.it: Solo per un istante.

translation.en: Usually, the house that was used in these crimes, they're generally razed.
translation.it: Di solito, le case dove sono commessi questi crimini vengono rase al suolo.

translation.en: They get rid of them and put a park in there or something like that.
translation.it: Le abbattono e ci costruiscono un parco o altro.

translation.en: But in this case, this is a historical home built in 1890,
translation.it: Ma, in questo caso, si tratta di una casa storica del 1890,

translation.en: and you cannot take these houses down.
translation.it: che non può essere demolita.

translation.en: It's gonna be here forever.
translation.it: Resterà qui per sempre.

translation.en: What area would you like to live in, in a boarding home?
translation.it: Se vivessi in una pensione, dove ti piacerebbe vivere?

translation.en: -What area? -Uh-huh.
translation.it: In che zona?

translation.en: Yeah, do you like the downtown area, or do you like to be out in the country?
translation.it: Insomma, ti piace il centro o preferisci stare in campagna?

translation.en: -Do you like this area around here? -Yeah.
translation.it: Ti piace questa zona? Sì.

translation.en: [Judy] We connected with Bert's family members.
translation.it: Contattammo i familiari di Bert.

translation.en: We told them that he had passed and how sad it was
translation.it: Dicemmo loro che era morto, quanto ci dispiacesse

translation.en: and that we were going to have a memorial.
translation.it: e che avremmo organizzato una commemorazione.

translation.en: And we would be happy to pay their way
translation.it: Avremmo pagato volentieri le spese di viaggio,

translation.en: to come out and be there for his funeral service.
translation.it: così avrebbero potuto partecipare al funerale.

translation.en: At the gravesite, I did the eulogy.
translation.it: Tenetti io l'elogio funebre davanti alla tomba.

translation.en: And all the people who knew and loved Bert were there.
translation.it: C'erano tutte le persone che conoscevano e volevano bene a Bert.

translation.en: It was a very sad ceremony, but…
translation.it: Fu una cerimonia molto triste, ma…

translation.en: I just feel that it was his destiny
translation.it: sento che era il suo destino,

translation.en: to expose Dorothea Puente.
translation.it: smascherare Dorothea Puente.

translation.en: I just feel that way.
translation.it: Me lo sento.
